  • Returns the abstract product ID by given concrete product ID.
findProductConcreteById

  • Returns the concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns null if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getProductConcrete

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
hasProductAttributeKey

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.
findProductAttributeKey

  • Returns the product attribute key if it exists, null otherwise.
createProductAttributeKey

  • Creates new product attribute key.

  • Returns created product attribute key.
updateProductAttributeKey

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.
touchProductAbstract

  • Touches the abstract product and all of its concrete products.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the abstract product and its concrete products.
touchProductActive

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as active.
touchProductInactive

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as in-active.
touchProductDeleted

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as deleted.
touchProductConcrete

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the concrete product.
touchProductConcreteActive

  • Touches "product_concrete" as active.
touchProductConcreteInactive

  • Touches "product_concrete" as in-active.
touchProductConcreteDelete

  • Touches "product_concrete" as deleted.
createProductUrl

  • Creates localized abstract product URLs based on abstract product localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL activation.
updateProductUrl

  • Updates localized abstract product URLs based on abstract product localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL update.
getProductUrl

  • Returns localized abstract product URLs for all available locales.
deleteProductUrl

  • Deletes all URLs belonging to the given abstract product.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL deletion.
touchProductAbstractUrlActive

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as active.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as deleted.
getLocalizedProductAbstractName

  • Returns localized abstract product name based on localized attributes.
getLocalizedProductConcreteName

  • Returns localized concrete product name based on localized attributes.
activateProductConcrete

  • Activates concrete product.

  • Generates and saves the related abstract product URL.

  • Touches concrete product as active.

  • Touches abstract product URL as active.
deactivateProductConcrete

  • Deactivates concrete product.

  • Touches concrete product as active.

  • Deletes abstract product URL if abstract product is inactive.
generateAttributePermutations

  • Generates all possible permutations of the given attributes.

    Leaf node of a tree is concrete id.

    (

    [color:red] => array (

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    ),

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [color:red] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    )

    )
generateVariants

  • Generates concrete products based on attributes.

    Expected input AttributeCollection structure:

    (

    [color] => Array

    (

    [red] => Red

    [blue] => Blue

    )

    [flavour] => Array

    (

    [sweet] => Cakes

    )

    [size] => Array

    (

    [40] => 40

    [41] => 41

    [42] => 42

    )

    )
isProductActive

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of the abstract product is active.
isProductConcreteActive

  • Returns true if concrete product is active.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeys

  • Returns the attribute keys of the abstract product and its concrete products.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeysForProductIds

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of the persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete product's attributes and its abstract product's attributes.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.
suggestProductAbstract

  • Suggests product abstract by name or SKU.
suggestProductConcrete

  • Suggests product concrete by name or SKU.
findProductConcreteIdsByAbstractProductId

  • Finds product concrete ids by product abstract id.

Clients

Client Method Description
getProductAbstractFromStorageById

  • Reads abstract product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductAbstractFromStorageByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads abstract product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdProductAbstractForCurrentLocale

  • Reads attribute map from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdAndLocale

  • Reads attribute map from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getProductConcreteByIdAndLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteCollection

  • Reads concrete product data based on provided product concrete id collection.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted concrete product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when a concrete product is created.

  • Can be used to persist additional concrete product related information.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is created.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted abstract product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.

Dependencies:

  • PHP >=7.1
  • Event ^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^3.0.0
  • KeyBuilder ^1.0.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • Storage ^3.0.0
  • Store ^1.1.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0
  • Touch ^3.0.0 || ^4.0.0
  • Url ^3.2.1
  • UtilEncoding ^2.0.0
  • UtilText ^1.1.0

Suggested Installations:

 6.1.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds abstract product with its attributes, meta data, and concrete products.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract and concrete products.
saveProduct

  • Saves abstract product with its concrete products.

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche updated abstract and concrete products.
createProductAbstract

  • Adds abstract product attributes.

  • Adds abstract product localized attributes.

  • Adds abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.
saveProductAbstract

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product localized attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Updates the URL of an active abstract product if it is changed.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
hasProductAbstract

  • Checks if the abstract product exists.
findProductAbstractIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of an abstract product for the given SKU if it exists, null otherwise.
findProductAbstractById

  • Returns an abstract product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getAbstractSkuFromProductConcrete

  • Returns the SKU of an abstract product that belongs to the given SKU of a concrete product.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteSku

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product SKU if it exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
createProductConcrete

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.
saveProductConcrete

  • Saves concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.
hasProductConcrete

  • Checks if the concrete product exists.
findProductConcreteIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.
findProductConcreteById

  • Returns the concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns null if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getProductConcrete

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
hasProductAttributeKey

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.
findProductAttributeKey

  • Returns the product attribute key if it exists, null otherwise.
createProductAttributeKey

  • Creates new product attribute key.

  • Returns created product attribute key.
updateProductAttributeKey

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.
touchProductAbstract

  • Touches the abstract product and all of its concrete products.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the abstract product and its concrete products.
touchProductActive

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as active.
touchProductInactive

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as in-active.
touchProductDeleted

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as deleted.
touchProductConcrete

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the concrete product.
touchProductConcreteActive

  • Touches "product_concrete" as active.
touchProductConcreteInactive

  • Touches "product_concrete" as in-active.
touchProductConcreteDelete

  • Touches "product_concrete" as deleted.
createProductUrl

  • Creates localized abstract product URLs based on abstract product localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL activation.
updateProductUrl

  • Updates localized abstract product URLs based on abstract product localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL update.
getProductUrl

  • Returns localized abstract product URLs for all available locales.
deleteProductUrl

  • Deletes all URLs belonging to the given abstract product.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL deletion.
touchProductAbstractUrlActive

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as active.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as deleted.
getLocalizedProductAbstractName

  • Returns localized abstract product name based on localized attributes.
getLocalizedProductConcreteName

  • Returns localized concrete product name based on localized attributes.
activateProductConcrete

  • Activates concrete product.

  • Generates and saves the related abstract product URL.

  • Touches concrete product as active.

  • Touches abstract product URL as active.
deactivateProductConcrete

  • Deactivates concrete product.

  • Touches concrete product as active.

  • Deletes abstract product URL if abstract product is inactive.
generateAttributePermutations

  • Generates all possible permutations of the given attributes.

    Leaf node of a tree is concrete id.

    (

    [color:red] => array (

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    ),

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [color:red] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    )

    )
generateVariants

  • Generates concrete products based on attributes.

    Expected input AttributeCollection structure:

    (

    [color] => Array

    (

    [red] => Red

    [blue] => Blue

    )

    [flavour] => Array

    (

    [sweet] => Cakes

    )

    [size] => Array

    (

    [40] => 40

    [41] => 41

    [42] => 42

    )

    )
isProductActive

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of the abstract product is active.
isProductConcreteActive

  • Returns true if concrete product is active.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeys

  • Returns the attribute keys of the abstract product and its concrete products.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeysForProductIds

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of the persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete product's attributes and its abstract product's attributes.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

Clients

Client Method Description
getProductAbstractFromStorageById

  • Reads abstract product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductAbstractFromStorageByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads abstract product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdProductAbstractForCurrentLocale

  • Reads attribute map from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdAndLocale

  • Reads attribute map from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getProductConcreteByIdAndLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteCollection

  • Reads concrete product data based on provided product concrete id collection.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted concrete product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is created.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.

Suggested Installations:

 6.1.0

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds abstract product with its attributes, meta data, and concrete products.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract and concrete products.
saveProduct

  • Saves abstract product with its concrete products.

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche updated abstract and concrete products.
createProductAbstract

  • Adds abstract product attributes.

  • Adds abstract product localized attributes.

  • Adds abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.
saveProductAbstract

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product localized attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Updates the URL of an active abstract product if it is changed.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
hasProductAbstract

  • Checks if the abstract product exists.
findProductAbstractIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of an abstract product for the given SKU if it exists, null otherwise.
findProductAbstractById

  • Returns an abstract product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getAbstractSkuFromProductConcrete

  • Returns the SKU of an abstract product that belongs to the given SKU of a concrete product.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteSku

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product SKU if it exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.

  • Returns the concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns null if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.

  • Triggers READ plugins.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is created.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when a concrete product is created.

  • Can be used to persist additional concrete product related information.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.

  • PHP >=7.1
  • Event ^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^3.0.0
  • KeyBuilder ^1.0.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • Storage ^3.0.0
  • Store ^1.1.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0
  • Touch ^3.0.0 || ^4.0.0
  • Url ^3.2.1
  • UtilEncoding ^2.0.0
  • UtilText ^1.1.0

Suggested Installations:

 6.0.2

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds abstract product with its attributes, meta data, and concrete products.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract and concrete products.
saveProduct

  • Saves abstract product with its concrete products.

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche updated abstract and concrete products.
createProductAbstract

  • Adds abstract product attributes.

  • Adds abstract product localized attributes.

  • Adds abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.
saveProductAbstract

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product localized attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Updates the URL of an active abstract product if it is changed.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
hasProductAbstract

  • Checks if the abstract product exists.
findProductAbstractIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of an abstract product for the given SKU if it exists, null otherwise.
findProductAbstractById

  • Returns an abstract product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getAbstractSkuFromProductConcrete

  • Returns the SKU of an abstract product that belongs to the given SKU of a concrete product.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteSku

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product SKU if it exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
createProductConcrete

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.
saveProductConcrete

  • Saves concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.
hasProductConcrete

  • Checks if the concrete product exists.
findProductConcreteIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.
findProductConcreteById

  • Returns the concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns null if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getProductConcrete

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
hasProductAttributeKey

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.
findProductAttributeKey

  • Returns the product attribute key if it exists, null otherwise.
createProductAttributeKey

  • Creates new product attribute key.

  • Returns created product attribute key.
updateProductAttributeKey

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.
touchProductAbstract

  • Touches the abstract product and all of its concrete products.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the abstract product and its concrete products.
touchProductActive

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as active.
touchProductInactive

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as in-active.
touchProductDeleted

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as deleted.
touchProductConcrete

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the concrete product.
touchProductConcreteActive

  • Touches "product_concrete" as active.
touchProductConcreteInactive

  • Touches "product_concrete" as in-active.
touchProductConcreteDelete

  • Touches "product_concrete" as deleted.
createProductUrl

  • Creates localized abstract product URLs based on abstract product localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL activation.
updateProductUrl

  • Updates localized abstract product URLs based on abstract product localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL update.
getProductUrl

  • Returns localized abstract product URLs for all available locales.
deleteProductUrl

  • Deletes all URLs belonging to the given abstract product.

  • Executes touch logic for abstract product URL deletion.
touchProductAbstractUrlActive

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as active.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as deleted.
getLocalizedProductAbstractName

  • Returns localized abstract product name based on localized attributes.
getLocalizedProductConcreteName

  • Returns localized concrete product name based on localized attributes.
activateProductConcrete

  • Activates concrete product.

  • Generates and saves the related abstract product URL.

  • Touches concrete product as active.

  • Touches abstract product URL as active.
deactivateProductConcrete

  • Deactivates concrete product.

  • Touches concrete product as active.

  • Deletes abstract product URL if abstract product is inactive.
generateAttributePermutations

  • Generates all possible permutations of the given attributes.

    Leaf node of a tree is concrete id.

    (

    [color:red] => array (

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    ),

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [color:red] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    )

    )
generateVariants

  • Generates concrete products based on attributes.

    Expected input AttributeCollection structure:

    (

    [color] => Array

    (

    [red] => Red

    [blue] => Blue

    )

    [flavour] => Array

    (

    [sweet] => Cakes

    )

    [size] => Array

    (

    [40] => 40

    [41] => 41

    [42] => 42

    )

    )
isProductActive

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of the abstract product is active.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeys

  • Returns the attribute keys of the abstract product and its concrete products.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeysForProductIds

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of the persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete product's attributes and its abstract product's attributes.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

Clients

Client Method Description
getProductAbstractFromStorageById

  • Reads abstract product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductAbstractFromStorageByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads abstract product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdProductAbstractForCurrentLocale

  • Reads attribute map from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdAndLocale

  • Reads attribute map from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getProductConcreteByIdAndLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteCollection

  • Reads concrete product data based on provided product concrete id collection.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is created.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when a concrete product is created.

  • Can be used to persist additional concrete product related information.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted abstract product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted concrete product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.

Dependencies:

  • PHP >=7.1
  • Event ^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^3.0.0
  • KeyBuilder ^1.0.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • Storage ^3.0.0
  • Store ^1.1.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0
  • Touch ^3.0.0 || ^4.0.0
  • Url ^3.2.1
  • UtilEncoding ^2.0.0
  • UtilText ^1.1.0

Suggested Installations:

 6.0.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds abstract product with its attributes, meta data, and concrete products.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract and concrete products.

  • Saves abstract product with its concrete products.

  • Saves abstract product attributes.

  • Saves abstract product meta data.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Does not activate or touche updated abstract and concrete products.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if an abstract product with the same SKU exists.

  • Does not activate or touche created abstract product.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Checks if the abstract product exists.

findProductAbstractById

  • Returns an abstract product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Triggers READ plugins.

  • Returns the SKU of an abstract product that belongs to the given SKU of a concrete product.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteSku

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product SKU if it exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.

  • Saves concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.

findProductConcreteById

  • Returns the concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns null if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.

  • Returns created product attribute key.

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the abstract product and its concrete products.

  • Touches "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map" as deleted.

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract", and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depend on the current status of the concrete product.

  • Touches "product_concrete" as active.

encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is created.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when a concrete product is created.

  • Can be used to persist additional concrete product related information.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted abstract product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds abstract product with its attributes, meta data, and concrete products.

  • Throws exception if a concrete product with the same SKU exists.

  • Triggers "before" and "after" CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as active.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the abstract product for all available locales as deleted.

    (

    [color:red] => array (

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    ),

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [color:red] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    )

    )

    (

    [color] => Array

    [sweet] => Cakes

    [40] => 40

    [42] => 42

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of the abstract product is active.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeys

  • Returns the attribute keys of the abstract product and its concrete products.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeysForProductIds

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of the persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete product's attributes and its abstract product's attributes.

  • Includes localized abstract product and concrete products attribute keys when $localeTransfer is provided.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

Clients

Client Method Description
getProductAbstractFromStorageById

  • Reads abstract product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductAbstractFromStorageByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads abstract product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdProductAbstractForCurrentLocale

  • Reads attribute map from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getAttributeMapByIdAndLocale

  • Reads attribute map from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from Storage.

  • Selects Storage using current shop locale.
getProductConcreteByIdAndLocale

  • Reads concrete product data from locale specific Storage.
getProductConcreteCollection

  • Reads concrete product data based on provided product concrete id collection.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is created.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when a concrete product is created.

  • Can be used to persist additional concrete product related information.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin is executed on "after" event.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted abstract product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed on retrieved persisted concrete product data.

  • Can be used to extend the ProductAbstractTransfer with extra information.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed on "before" and/or on "after" event when an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used to persist additional abstract product related information.

Dependencies:

  • PHP >=7.1
  • Event ^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^3.0.0
  • KeyBuilder ^1.0.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • Storage ^3.0.0
  • Store ^1.1.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0
  • Touch ^3.0.0 || ^4.0.0
  • Url ^3.2.1
  • UtilEncoding ^2.0.0
  • UtilText ^1.1.0

Suggested Installations:

 5.6.0

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds product abstract with its attributes, meta information and concrete variants.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Trigger before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Abstract and concrete products are created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
saveProduct

  • Saves product abstract with its concrete variants.

  • Saves product abstract attributes.

  • Saves product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract and concrete products are updated but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.
createProductAbstract

  • Adds product abstract attributes.

  • Adds product abstract localized attributes.

  • Adds product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract product is created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
saveProductAbstract

  • Saves product abstract attributes

  • Saves product abstract localized attributes

  • Saves product abstract meta

  • Updates URL of an active product when it's changed.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists

  • Abstract product is created but not activated or touched

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.
hasProductAbstract

  • Checks if product abstract exists
findProductAbstractIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of an abstract product for the given SKU if it exists, NULL otherwise.
findProductAbstractById

  • Returns abstract product with attributes and localized attributes

  • Triggers READ plugins
getAbstractSkuFromProductConcrete

  • Returns the SKU of an abstract product that belongs to the given SKU of a concrete product.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteSku

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product SKU if exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
createProductConcrete

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.
saveProductConcrete

  • Saves concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.
hasProductConcrete

  • Checks if product concrete exists.
findProductConcreteIdBySku

  • Returns ID of concrete product.
findProductConcreteById

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns NULL if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getProductConcrete

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
hasProductAttributeKey

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.
findProductAttributeKey

  • Returns product attribute key if exists, NULL otherwise.
createProductAttributeKey

  • Creates new product attribute key.

  • Returns created product attribute key.
updateProductAttributeKey

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.
touchProductAbstract

  • Touches abstract product and all it's variants.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete" and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depends on the current status of the product and it's variants.
touchProductActive

  • Touches as active: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductInactive

  • Touches as in-active: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductDeleted

  • Touches as deleted: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductConcrete

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract" and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depends on the current status of the product.
touchProductConcreteActive

  • Touches as active: "product_concrete".
touchProductConcreteInactive

  • Touches as in-active: "product_concrete".
touchProductConcreteDelete

  • Touches as deleted: "product_concrete".
createProductUrl

  • Creates localized product URLs based on product abstract localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL activation.
updateProductUrl

  • Updates localized product URLs based on product abstract localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL update.
getProductUrl

  • Returns localized product URLs for all available locales.
deleteProductUrl

  • Deletes all URLs belonging to given abstract product.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL deletion.
touchProductAbstractUrlActive

  • Touches the URL of the product as active for all available locales.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the product as deleted for all available locales.
getLocalizedProductAbstractName

  • Returns localized product abstract name based on localized attributes.
getLocalizedProductConcreteName

  • Returns localized product concrete name based on localized attributes.
activateProductConcrete

  • Activates product concrete.

  • Generates and saves product abstract URL.

  • Touches as active product.

  • Touches as active product URL.
deactivateProductConcrete

  • Deactivates product concrete.

  • Removes product URL.

  • Touches as in-active product.

  • Touches as in-active product URL.
generateAttributePermutations

  • Generatate all possible permutations for given attributes.

    Leaf node of a tree is concrete id.

    (

    [color:red] => array (

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    ),

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [color:red] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    )

    )
generateVariants

  • Generates product variants based on attributes.

    $attributeCollection = Array

    (

    [color] => Array

    (

    [red] => Red

    [blue] => Blue

    )

    [flavour] => Array

    (

    [sweet] => Cakes

    )

    [size] => Array

    (

    [40] => 40

    [41] => 41

    [42] => 42

    )

    )

    )
isProductActive

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of abstract products are active.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeys

  • Returns an array with attribute keys of a persisted product.

  • The result is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeysForProductIds

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of a persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete's attributes and its abstract's attributes.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized concrete and abstract attributes are also part of the result.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.
findProductConcreteIdsByAbstractProductId

  • Finds product concrete ids by product abstract id.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteId

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product ID if it exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.

Clients

Client Method Description
getProductAbstractFromStorageById

  • Read abstract product data from yves storage, based on provided
getProductAbstractFromStorageByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Read abstract product data from yves storage, based on current shop selected locale
getAttributeMapByIdProductAbstractForCurrentLocale

  • Read attribute map from storage, based on current shop selected locale
getAttributeMapByIdAndLocale

  • Read attribute map from storage, based on provided
getProductConcreteByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Read concrete product data from yves storage, based on current shop selected locale
getProductConcreteByIdAndLocale

  • Read concrete product data from yves storage, based on provided locale
getProductConcreteCollection

  • Read product concrete information based on product concrete id collection

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed before and after an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used for persisting other concrete product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed before and after an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used for persisting other abstract product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed after a persisted concrete product is read from database.

  • Can be used for extending the ProductAbstractTransfer with some extra information or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed before and after an concrete product is created.

  • Can be used for persisting other concrete product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin executed on "after" event.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed before and after an abstract product is created.

  • Can be used for persisting other abstract product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin executed on "after" event.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed after a persisted abstract product is read from database.

  • Can be used for extending the ProductAbstractTransfer with some extra information or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.

Dependencies:

  • Event ^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^3.0.0
  • KeyBuilder ^1.0.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • Storage ^3.0.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds product abstract with its attributes, meta information and concrete variants.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Trigger before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Abstract and concrete products are created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Saves product abstract with its concrete variants.

  • Saves product abstract attributes.

  • Saves product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract and concrete products are updated but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Adds product abstract attributes.

  • Adds product abstract localized attributes.

  • Adds product abstract meta.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract product is created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed before and after an abstract product is created.

  • Can be used for persisting other abstract product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin executed on "after" event.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed before and after an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used for persisting other abstract product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed before and after an concrete product is created.

  • Can be used for persisting other concrete product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin executed on "after" event.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed after a persisted abstract product is read from database.

  • Can be used for extending the ProductAbstractTransfer with some extra information or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed after a persisted concrete product is read from database.

/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed before and after an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used for persisting other concrete product related information to database or execute any other logic.

 5.4.2

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds product abstract with its attributes, meta information and concrete variants.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Trigger before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Abstract and concrete products are created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Saves product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract and concrete products are updated but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Adds product abstract localized attributes.

  • Adds product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.

  • Triggers READ plugins

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.

  • Saves concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.

  • Checks if product concrete exists.
findProductConcreteIdBySku

  • Returns ID of concrete product.
findProductConcreteById

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns NULL if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getProductConcrete

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
hasProductAttributeKey

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.
findProductAttributeKey

  • Returns product attribute key if exists, NULL otherwise.
createProductAttributeKey

  • Creates new product attribute key.

  • Returns created product attribute key.
updateProductAttributeKey

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.
touchProductAbstract

  • Touches abstract product and all it's variants.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete" and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depends on the current status of the product and it's variants.
touchProductActive

  • Touches as active: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductInactive

  • Touches as in-active: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductDeleted

  • Touches as deleted: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductConcrete

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract" and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depends on the current status of the product.
touchProductConcreteActive

  • Touches as active: "product_concrete".
touchProductConcreteInactive

  • Touches as in-active: "product_concrete".
touchProductConcreteDelete

  • Touches as deleted: "product_concrete".
createProductUrl

  • Creates localized product URLs based on product abstract localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL activation.
updateProductUrl

  • Updates localized product URLs based on product abstract localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL update.
getProductUrl

  • Returns localized product URLs for all available locales.
deleteProductUrl

  • Deletes all URLs belonging to given abstract product.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL deletion.
touchProductAbstractUrlActive

  • Touches the URL of the product as active for all available locales.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the product as deleted for all available locales.
getLocalizedProductAbstractName

  • Returns localized product abstract name based on localized attributes.
getLocalizedProductConcreteName

  • Returns localized product concrete name based on localized attributes.
activateProductConcrete

  • Activates product concrete.

  • Generates and saves product abstract URL.

  • Touches as active product.

  • Touches as active product URL.
deactivateProductConcrete

  • Deactivates product concrete.

  • Removes product URL.

  • Touches as in-active product.

  • Touches as in-active product URL.
generateAttributePermutations

  • Generatate all possible permutations for given attributes.

    Leaf node of a tree is concrete id.

    (

    [color:red] => array (

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    ),

    [brand:nike] => array(

    [color:red] => array(

    [id] => 1

    )

    )

    )
generateVariants

  • Generates product variants based on attributes.

    $attributeCollection = Array

    (

    [color] => Array

    (

    [red] => Red

    [blue] => Blue

    )

    [flavour] => Array

    (

    [sweet] => Cakes

    )

    [size] => Array

    (

    [40] => 40

    [41] => 41

    [42] => 42

    )

    )

    )
isProductActive

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of abstract products are active.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeys

  • Returns an array with attribute keys of a persisted product.

  • The result is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedAbstractAttributeKeysForProductIds

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of a persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete's attributes and its abstract's attributes.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized concrete and abstract attributes are also part of the result.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

Clients

Client Method Description
getProductAbstractFromStorageById

  • Read abstract product data from yves storage, based on provided
getProductAbstractFromStorageByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Read abstract product data from yves storage, based on current shop selected locale
getAttributeMapByIdProductAbstractForCurrentLocale

  • Read attribute map from storage, based on current shop selected locale
getAttributeMapByIdAndLocale

  • Read attribute map from storage, based on provided
getProductConcreteByIdForCurrentLocale

  • Read concrete product data from yves storage, based on current shop selected locale
getProductConcreteByIdAndLocale

  • Read concrete product data from yves storage, based on provided locale
getProductConcreteCollection

  • Read product concrete information based on product concrete id collection

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed before and after an abstract product is created.

  • Can be used for persisting other abstract product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • The ID of the abstract product is available only if the plugin executed on "after" event.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed before and after an abstract product is updated.

  • Can be used for persisting other abstract product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginCreateInterface.php create

  • Executed before and after an concrete product is created.

  • Can be used for persisting other concrete product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • The ID of the concrete product is available only if the plugin executed on "after" event.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductAbstractPluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed after a persisted abstract product is read from database.

  • Can be used for extending the ProductAbstractTransfer with some extra information or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginReadInterface.php read

  • Executed after a persisted concrete product is read from database.

  • Can be used for extending the ProductAbstractTransfer with some extra information or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Product/​Dependency/​Plugin/​ProductConcretePluginUpdateInterface.php update

  • Executed before and after an concrete product is updated.

  • Can be used for persisting other concrete product related information to database or execute any other logic.

  • To inject instances of the plugin @see \Spryker\Zed\Product\ProductDependencyProvider.

Dependencies:

  • Event ^1.0.0 || ^2.0.0
  • Kernel ^3.0.0
  • KeyBuilder ^1.0.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • Storage ^3.0.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0
  • Touch ^3.0.0
  • Url ^3.2.1
  • UtilEncoding ^2.0.0
  • UtilText ^1.1.0

Suggested Installations:

 5.4.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
addProduct

  • Adds product abstract with its attributes, meta information and concrete variants.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Trigger before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Abstract and concrete products are created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
saveProduct

  • Saves product abstract with its concrete variants.

  • Saves product abstract attributes.

  • Saves product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract and concrete products are updated but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.
createProductAbstract

  • Adds product abstract attributes.

  • Adds product abstract localized attributes.

  • Adds product abstract meta.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists.

  • Abstract product is created but not activated or touched.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created abstract product.
saveProductAbstract

  • Saves product abstract attributes

  • Saves product abstract localized attributes

  • Saves product abstract meta

  • Updates URL of an active product when it's changed.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins

  • Throws exception if abstract product with same SKU exists

  • Abstract product is created but not activated or touched

  • Returns the ID of the abstract product.
hasProductAbstract

  • Checks if product abstract exists
findProductAbstractIdBySku

  • Returns the ID of an abstract product for the given SKU if it exists, NULL otherwise.
findProductAbstractById

  • Returns abstract product with attributes and localized attributes

  • Triggers READ plugins
getAbstractSkuFromProductConcrete

  • Returns the SKU of an abstract product that belongs to the given SKU of a concrete product.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
getProductAbstractIdByConcreteSku

  • Returns the abstract product ID of the given concrete product SKU if exists.

  • Throws exception if no abstract product is found.
createProductConcrete

  • Adds concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Triggers before and after CREATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the newly created concrete product.
saveProductConcrete

  • Saves concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if product concrete with same SKU exists.

  • Triggers before and after UPDATE plugins.

  • Returns the ID of the concrete product.
hasProductConcrete

  • Checks if product concrete exists.
findProductConcreteIdBySku

  • Returns ID of concrete product.
findProductConcreteById

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Returns NULL if the concrete product is not found by ID.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getProductConcrete

  • Returns concrete product with attributes and localized attributes.

  • Throws exception if the concrete product is not found by SKU.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
getConcreteProductsByAbstractProductId

  • Returns concrete product collection.

  • Triggers READ plugins.
hasProductAttributeKey

  • Checks if the product attribute key exists.
findProductAttributeKey

  • Returns product attribute key if exists, NULL otherwise.
createProductAttributeKey

  • Creates new product attribute key.

  • Returns created product attribute key.
updateProductAttributeKey

  • Updates an existing product attribute key.

  • Returns the updated product attribute key.
touchProductAbstract

  • Touches abstract product and all it's variants.

  • Touches related "product_abstract", "product_concrete" and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depends on the current status of the product and it's variants.
touchProductActive

  • Touches as active: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductInactive

  • Touches as in-active: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductDeleted

  • Touches as deleted: "product_abstract" and "product_attribute_map".
touchProductConcrete

  • Touches a concrete product.

  • Touches related "product_concrete", "product_abstract" and "attribute_map" entries.

  • Used touch event statuses (active, inactive) depends on the current status of the product.
touchProductConcreteActive

  • Touches as active: "product_concrete".
touchProductConcreteInactive

  • Touches as in-active: "product_concrete".
touchProductConcreteDelete

  • Touches as deleted: "product_concrete".
createProductUrl

  • Creates localized product URLs based on product abstract localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL activation.
updateProductUrl

  • Updates localized product URLs based on product abstract localized attributes name.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL update.
getProductUrl

  • Returns localized product URLs for all available locales.
deleteProductUrl

  • Deletes all URLs belonging to given abstract product.

  • Executes touch logic for product URL deletion.
touchProductAbstractUrlActive

  • Touches the URL of the product as active for all available locales.
touchProductAbstractUrlDeleted

  • Touches the URL of the product as deleted for all available locales.
getLocalizedProductAbstractName

  • Returns localized product abstract name based on localized attributes.
getLocalizedProductConcreteName

  • Returns localized product concrete name based on localized attributes.
activateProductConcrete

  • Activates product concrete.

  • Generates and saves product abstract URL.

  • Touches as active product.

  • Touches as active product URL.
deactivateProductConcrete

  • Deactivates product concrete.

  • Removes product URL.

  • Touches as in-active product.

  • Touches as in-active product URL.

  • Generatate all possible permutations for given attributes.

    Leaf node of a tree is concrete id.

    [color:red] => array (

    [id] => 1

    [id] => 1

    (

    [color] => Array

    [blue] => Blue

    )

    (

    [sweet] => Cakes

    )

    [size] => Array

    (

    [40] => 40

    [41] => 41

    [42] => 42

    )

    )

    )

  • Returns true if any of the concrete products of abstract products are active.

  • Returns an array with attribute keys of a persisted product.

  • The result is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.

  • Returns an array of productIds as keys with array of attribute keys as values of a persisted products.

  • The attribute keys is a combination of the abstract product's attribute keys and all its existing concretes' attribute keys.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized abstract and concrete attribute keys are also part of the result.
getCombinedConcreteAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs of a persisted concrete product.

  • The result is a combination of the concrete's attributes and its abstract's attributes.

  • If $localeTransfer is provided then localized concrete and abstract attributes are also part of the result.
combineRawProductAttributes

  • Returns an associative array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.

  • The result is the correct inheritance combination of the provided raw product attribute data.
encodeProductAttributes

  • Encodes an array of product attribute key - attribute value pairs to JSON string.
decodeProductAttributes

  • Decodes product attributes JSON string to an array of attribute key - attribute value pairs.
